definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: And believe me I worry about leaving your father here to cope with all you monsters.
sentences.chinese: 不瞞你說我還擔心你們爸爸，要對付你們幾個小魔頭。

sentences.english: Suddenly Howell was getting the hang of talking to this hellion in a wheelchair.
sentences.chinese: 豪厄爾漸漸掌握了和這個輪椅上的女魔頭談話的技巧。

sentences.english: Jupiter is just as much a menace as a savior, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，木星是個救世主，但還是一個大魔頭。

sentences.english: Harpies are notoriously bad at taking that kind of joke.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，女魔頭們接受不了這樣的玩笑。

definition: to show off/to put on a show to amuse others
lit. chickens flying and dogs jumping (idiom)/fig. in chaos/in disarray
lit. dress up as God, play the devil (idiom); fig. to mystify/to deceive people/to scam
to knock sb out with a drug/to render sb unconscious
(dialect) hen/prostitute/(Tw) interfering/nosy/busybody (from Taiwanese 家婆, Tai-lo pr. [ke-pô])
